ProcedurePlanDefinition.name: ProcedurePlanDefinition
ProcedurePlanDefinition.description: Represents the setup of a unified procedure from a list of multiple procedures that can be sequenced in any order based on business needs. Each procedure plan definition contains sections and subsections where procedures can be configured by using a lookup table or rule-based criteria.

Description.description: The description of the procedure plan definition.

DeveloperName.description: The unique name of the procedure plan definition record.

Language.description: The language of the procedure plan definition.

MasterLabel.description: The master label of the procedure plan definition.

NamespacePrefix.description: The namespace prefix that is associated with this object. Each Developer Edition org that creates a managed package has a unique namespace prefix. Limit: 15 characters. You can refer to a component in a managed package by using the namespacePrefix__componentName notation.

PrimaryObject.description: The object associated to the procedure plan definition. The fields in the object are used as variables in the procedure plan criterion.

ProcessType.description: Identify the business processes that need a procedure plan for each SObject and definition.
